SUMMARY: The Department of Homeland Security is demanding "detailed records" on Harvard University's student visa holders, according to a statement from the department.

TITLE: Slamming Trump administration, court denies request to appeal Abrego Garcia ruling
SUMMARY: The U.S. Court of Appeals for the 4th Circuit has denied the Trump administration’s effort to appeal an order requiring it to facilitate Kilmar Abrego Garcia's return.

TITLE: Power restored to nearly all of Puerto Rico
SUMMARY: Power has been restored to nearly 99% of customers, LUMA Energy said in an update early Friday.

TITLE: WATCH:  Exclusive: Wife of man wrongfully deported to El Salvador speaks out
SUMMARY: Jennifer Vasquez Sura, the wife of Kilmar Abrego Garcia, speaks with “GMA” about the legal battle involving her husband now playing out in the courts.

TITLE: WATCH:  Ryan Gosling shares movie news at 'Star Wars' celebration in Japan
SUMMARY: ABC News’ Eva Pilgrim reports live from Tokyo, where Gosling and director Shawn Levy announced their new movie, “Star Wars: Starfighter.”

TITLE: WATCH:  Part of glacier breaks off during training exercise in Peruvian Andes
SUMMARY: A rescue training session high in the Peruvian Andes mountains turned into a real-life exercise when part of a massive glacier broke off unexpectedly.

TITLE: WATCH:  'I can't hold much longer': Man with dementia rescued after hanging from window
SUMMARY: An elderly man with dementia was rescued by police after his foot got stuck in a window and he was dangling from the second-story of his home, officials said.

TITLE: WATCH:  Bartender tosses hat onto customer’s head
SUMMARY: A bartender in the U.K. was captured on security camera video successfully tossing a hat directly onto the head of a happy customer.

TITLE: Trump admin live updates: Chris Krebs resigns from job after being targeted by Trump
SUMMARY: Chris Krebs, the former director of CISA, resigned from his job at a cybersecurity firm after being the target of an executive order by President Trump.

TITLE: Wife of Kilmar Abrego Garcia says seeing photo of him alive is 'very overwhelming'
SUMMARY: Jennifer Vasquez Sura, the wife of Kilmar Abrego Garcia, told ABC's "Good Morning America" Friday that seeing a photo of him alive has been "very overwhelming."

TITLE: WATCH:  Stunning 'pink moon' over Golden Gate Bridge
SUMMARY: Stunning time lapse video shows April’s full moon, known as the Pink Moon, rising over San Francisco's Golden Gate Bridge.

TITLE: As Abrego Garcia's deportation battle continues, differing pictures of him emerge
SUMMARY: Court filings and sworn declarations paint a complex picture of Kilmar Abrego Garcia, who sits at the center of one of the Trump administration's biggest legal standoffs.

TITLE: RFK Jr.'s comments on autism draw reactions from parents and experts
SUMMARY: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is facing growing criticism from parents and advocates who say his recent comments on autism were misguided.

TITLE: FSU shooting latest: Police search for motive in deadly campus attack
SUMMARY: The Florida State University community is reeling and police are searching for a motive after a gunman opened fire on the Tallahassee campus on Thursday.

TITLE: Trump tariffs live updates: Trump says US and China are discussing a deal
SUMMARY: Trump revealed for the first time Thursday that the U.S. is talking to China about a deal on tariffs, but he wouldn't say if he's talked to China's Xi directly.

TITLE: FSU student survives shooting after losing sister in Parkland
SUMMARY: When gunfire broke out at Florida State University on Thursday, for some on the Tallahassee campus, the tragedy brought them back to another school shooting.

TITLE: Maryland Sen. Chris Van Hollen shares photo with Kilmar Abrego Garcia in El Salvador
SUMMARY: Sen. Chris Van Hollen, D-Md., shared a photo of his meeting with Kilmar Abrego Garcia in El Salvador on Thursday.

TITLE: Judge blocks deportation of noncitizens to 3rd countries without due process
SUMMARY: A federal judge on Friday blocked the Trump administration from deporting noncitizens to countries other than their place of origin without due process.

TITLE: What to know about Phoenix Ikner: Alleged FSU gunman and stepson of sheriff's deputy
SUMMARY: The suspect was identified during the press conference as 20-year-old Phoenix Ikner, the stepson of Leon County Sheriff's Deputy Jessica Ikner.

TITLE: Trump admin live updates: Judge denies motion to enforce order on AP access
SUMMARY: Judge Trevor McFadden has denied the Associated Press' motion to enforce his order restoring the outlet's access to the press pool.

TITLE: SCOTUS sets arguments over injunctions on Trump bid to end birthright citizenship
SUMMARY: The Supreme Court will hear arguments in May over Trump's emergency request to rollback nationwide injunctions against his executive order to end birthright citizenship.
